title: Flags to debug python C extensions.
description: I often find myself debugging python C extensions from gdb, but usually some variables are hidden because aggressive optimizations that distutils sets by default. What I did not know, is that you can prevent those optimizations by passing flags -O0 -fno-inline to gcc in keyword extra_compile_args (note: this will only â€¦
dc:creator: Fabian Pedregosa
